ygData.subject: Re: Cazi Bind
ygData.msgSnippet: Brilinnia, Take care of Klaget (that is if he s going with you, I can only assume he is since he mentioned it to me today in email).  What is Cazi like?  What
ygData.messageBody:
Brilinnia,

Take care of Klaget (that is if he's going with you, I can only assume he is
since he mentioned it to me today in email). What is Cazi like? What kind
of party do you have? Can ya give us a break down of what all you're going
to do in Cazi? Give us some lower level bards something to look foward
too...

Gediprime
Xegony

----- Original Message -----
From: Rebecca Small <macha_nabaob@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, June 21, 1999 10:21 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Cazi Bind


> From: Rebecca Small <macha_nabaob@...>
>
> Hail Fellows,
> I'm a 20th level bard and plan on going to Cazi tonight. All of my friends
> and guildmates are typically bound in Freeport to go to Cazi but we will
be
> going in from Lake Rathe. After thinking about the logistics of bringing a
> whole group that far, getting bound in Freeport then going to Cazi, I
think
> we will not. We are currently bound in Arena, which is a basically empty
> zone right off Lake Rathe. This means we will have to cross the Rathe
> Mountains and come to Cazi from the spectre side but having made the run
> from Cazi to Lake Rathe once, I think it may be the closest bind point and
> shortest run back. The casters of course will bind to whatever suits them,
> hehe.
> Brilinnia, waiting on second name :)
> Xegony
>
>
